mapper.select: SELECT u.u_id, u.u_name, u.u_age, u.u_sex, u.u_address, u.u_tel, u.u_pwd, u.u_money, u.join_date, u.out_date, u.u_idcard_id, g.grade_id, l.level_id, l.level_name FROM user_info u left join grade_info g on u.u_grade = g.grade_id left join grade_level l on g.grade_level = l.level_id

SELECT u.u_id, u.u_name, u.u_age, u.u_sex, u.u_address, u.u_tel, u.u_pwd, u.u_money, u.join_date, u.out_date, u.u_idcard_id, g.grade_id, l.level_id, l.level_name FROM user_info u left join grade_info g on u.u_grade = g.grade_id left join grade_level l on g.grade_level = l.level_id where u.u_id = #{uid}

SELECT u.u_id, u.u_name, u.u_age, u.u_sex, u.u_address, u.u_tel, u.u_pwd, u.u_money, u.join_date, u.out_date, u.u_idcard_id, g.grade_id, l.level_id, l.level_name FROM user_info u left join grade_info g on u.u_grade = g.grade_id left join grade_level l on g.grade_level = l.level_id where u.u_tel = #{tel}
mapper.update: insert into user_info(u_id, u_tel, u_pwd) values(#{uid}, #{tel}, #{password})

update user_info set u_name = #{uname}, u_age = #{age}, u_sex = #{sex}, u_address = #{address}, u_tel = #{tel}, u_pwd = #{password}, u_money = #{money}, join_date = #{joinTime}, out_date = #{outTime}, u_idcard_id = #{idCard} where u_id = #{uid}
